item.title: Install RabbitMQ on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
item.description: Enable RabbitMQ application repository: echo "deb http://www.rabbitmq.com/debian/ testing main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list Add the verification key for the package: curl http://www.rabbitmq.com/rabbitmq-signing-key-public.asc | sudo apt-key add - Update the sources with our new addition from above: apt-get update And finally, download and install RabbitMQ: sudo apt-get install rabbitmq-server In order to manage the maximum amount of connections upon launch, open up and edit the following configuration file using nano and uncomment the line ulimit:
